scripts.dist: rm -rf packages/headless-json-editor/dist; yarn hje:dist; yarn rje:dist; yarn code:dist
scripts.hje:dist: rm -rf packages/headless-json-editor/dist; yarn hje:bundle; yarn hje:ts
scripts.hje:analyze: mkdir tmp; webpack --config webpack.hje.js --profile --json > tmp/hje-stats.json; webpack-bundle-analyzer tmp/hje-stats.json
scripts.rje:dist: rm -rf packages/react-json-editor/dist; yarn rje:bundle; yarn rje:ts
scripts.rje:analyze: mkdir tmp; PACKAGE_NAME=react-json-editor webpack --profile --json > tmp/rje-stats.json; webpack-bundle-analyzer tmp/rje-stats.json
scripts.code:dist: rm -rf packages/rje-code-widgets/dist; yarn code:bundle; yarn code:ts
scripts.code:analyze: mkdir tmp; PACKAGE_NAME=rje-code-widgets webpack --profile --json > tmp/rje-cw-stats.json; webpack-bundle-analyzer tmp/rje-cw-stats.json
